name: Suspicious Command Patterns In Scheduled Task Creation
description: Detects scheduled task creation using "schtasks" that contain potentially suspicious or uncommon commands
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

detection.condition: selection_schtasks and ( all of selection_pattern_* or selection_uncommon or all of selection_anomaly_* )

falsepositives: Software installers that run from temporary folders and also install scheduled tasks are expected to generate some false positives
